revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: " Syron kome, as praktores demosias:;Peion, son of Apollonios, mother Thermouthis;;Paaus, son of Sokmas. mother Heras;;Ptolemaios, son of Sokrates, grandson of Philadelphos, with the nickname Selpis;;Psontheus, son of Paaus, mother Tasooukis, with the nickname Tsemit;;Paaus, son of Kammatais;;Pathynis, son of Belekennis, mother Thermouthis;;-------------------------;likewise praktores katoikias:;Kollouthos, son of Heras, mother Hera, . . . Phelix;;Ptollion, son of Apynchis, mother Taseus; ;Miysis, son of Mouis, with the nickname Kats;;Apynchis, son of Pathynis, mother . . . ., Kalatios;;likewise praktores argyrikon:;Papion, son of Potamon, mother Tasoucharion;;Ptollas, son of Ptolemaios, Kalaoukis;;Tyrannos, son of Pathynis;;Potamon, son of Julius, physician;;Ptollion, son of Sokmas, with the nickname Ansas;;Paaus, son of Apynchis, with the nicknamea Alel;;Potamon, son of Pathynis, grandson of Kanibis, . . . .;;Marres, son of Paaus, son of Platon;;Neilos, son of Hatres, mother Thaesis;;Sokras, son of . . ., mother Eserempis;;Sokrates, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Neseus."

listBibl.bibl: Hagedorn U - Hagedorn D - Youtie LC - Youtie HC, PPetaus, 64, 1969
